product_name: Kuhl Renegade Hiker Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: The 30 in. inseam Kuhl RenegadeTM Hiker Pants with TufflexTM soft-shell fabric are equally at home on a trail, taking care of chores like chopping wood or hanging out at the coffee shop.
